text: Sardara (Sàrdara) is a town and comune (municipality) in the Province of Sud Sardegna in Sardinia, Italy. As of 2016, 4,076 people lived there. Its area is 56.23 km².Istituto nazionale di statistica - Superficie territoriale per zona altimetrica It is 163 meters above sea level. == Notes == == Other websites == Category:Communes of the Province of South Sardinia
title: Sardara
